name: Timed Collector
description: Collects data from multiple sources and flushes downstream on a schedule (1-24 hour intervals). Data is stored in MongoDB with timestamps.

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: Data from any source to collect

settings.name: dropInterval
settings.label: Drop Interval (hours)
settings.description: How often to flush data (1-24). Value of 1 = every hour (12:00, 13:00...), 24 = once per day at 00:00 UTC

settings.name: collectionName
settings.label: Collection Suffix
settings.description: Optional suffix for MongoDB collection name

settings.name: sourceLabel
settings.label: Source Label
settings.description: Label to identify the source of incoming data
